Music

I got my bachelor`s in classical music (trombone) in January of 2016 at Mozarteum Salzburg. I used to play in the band Viera Blech until October of 2019. As of now I am focusing on programming, but I`m still playing in diverse bands once in a while.

Experience

I`ve been studying at IT-Kolleg Imst, where I learned to code in Java Core / Spring-Boot using Clean-Architecture- & Domain Driven Design principles, design patterns, as well as programming in JS, HTML, CSS, PHP, MySQL, NoSQL & graph-databases like Neo4j. Recently I`ve been developing a Fullstack-Web-App using VueJS, TailwindCSS, Laravel and a MySQL database, utilizing Laravel Sanctum for tokenized user authentications, providing CRUD-functionality to an admin-dashboard.
